General.Name: CIFI Holdings (Group) Co. Ltd
General.Description: CIFI Holdings (Group) Co. Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates property development and investment business in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Sales of Properties and Other Property Related Services; Property Investment; and Property Management and Other Services segments. It develops and sells office and commercial premises, and residential properties; leases investment properties; and offers car parking, and project management and other property related services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.
